verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- long אָ֣נָה <WH575> 'A-nah How יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh Jehovah תִּשְׁכָּחֵ֣נִי <WH7911> tish-ka-Che-ni How long wilt thou forget נֶ֑צַח <WH5331> Ne-tzach; alway עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- long אָ֓נָה׀ <WH575> 'A-nah How תַּסְתִּ֖יר <WH5641> tas-Tir hide אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. at

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- long אָ֨נָה <WH575> 'A-nah How אָשִׁ֪ית <WH7896> 'a-Shit How long shall I take עֵצ֡וֹת <WH6098> e-Tzot counsel בְּנַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> be-naf-Shi, in my soul יָג֣וֹן <WH3015> ya-Gon [having] sorrow בִּלְבָבִ֣י <WH3824> bil-va-Vi in my heart יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> yo-Mam; daily עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- long אָ֓נָה׀ <WH575> 'A-nah How יָר֖וּם <WH7311> ya-Rum be exalted אֹיְבִ֣י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vi enemy עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. over

הַבִּ֣יטָֽה <WH5027> hab-Bi-tah Consider עֲ֭נֵנִי <WH6030> 'A-ne-ni [and] hear יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai; my God הָאִ֥ירָה <WH215> ha-'I-rah lighten עֵ֝ינַ֗י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai, mine eyes פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- or אִישַׁ֥ן <WH3462> 'i-Shan lest I sleep הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> ham-Ma-vet. the [sleep of] death

פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- lest יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> yo-Mar say אֹיְבִ֣י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vi Lest mine enemy יְכָלְתִּ֑יו <WH3201> ye-chal-Tiv; I have prevailed צָרַ֥י <WH6862> tza-Rai against him [and] those that trouble יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ <WH1523> ya-Gi-lu, me rejoice כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki when אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> em-Mot. when I am moved

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni in בְּחַסְדְּךָ֣ <WH2617> be-chas-de-Cha in thy mercy בָטַחְתִּי֮ <WH982> va-tach-Ti But I have trusted יָ֤גֵ֥ל <WH1523> ya-Gel shall rejoice לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> lib-Bi, my heart בִּֽישׁוּעָ֫תֶ֥ךָ <WH3444> bi-shu-'A-Te-cha in thy salvation

אָשִׁ֥ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah I will sing לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki Because גָמַ֣ל <WH1580> ga-Mal because he hath dealt bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. the chief
